pageTitle: OSGi Specification Implementations - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
textBeforeTable: Latest Specification Version: 1.8 2: Security[edit] The following sections list implementations of OSGi specifications organized by chapter. The Version column indicates the OSGi specification version supported, not the project version. The Certification column indicates whether an implementation participates in the OSGi Certification Program. The exact version of certified implementations can be obtained from the relevant implementation projects. Note that the order in which projects appear in the tables below is alphabetically. Implementations[edit] Specification chapters: Res2, Res3, 101-105, 107, 110-113, 117, 131, 701-702 Latest Specification Release: 4.3 Residential Specification[edit] Specification chapters: 101, 104-105, 109, 112-120, 701-702 Latest Specification Release: 4.0.1 Mobile Specification[edit] The Enterprise Specification contains an enterprise-focused subset of the OSGi specifications. Certain Specification chapters are not yet in the Compendium Specification document because it was released before the Enterprise Specification. Specification chapters: 100-102, 104-105, 107, 110, 112-113, 121-130, 132-136, 701-702 (note that although the specification PDF contains a chapter 131 (Resolver) this incorrectly numbered and should have number 136). Latest Specification Release: 5 Enterprise Specification[edit] The Compendium Specification contains all the specification chapters not in the Core Specification which are part of the OSGi Service Platform. Specification chapters: 100-117, 119-123, 125-128, 130, 132-136,
textAfterTable: ProSyst 1.5 http://www.prosyst.com Participates 3 - 10: Core Framework[edit] Chapters 3-10 in the Core Release 6 specification. The Core Release 5 specification comprises the following APIs, which every framework implementation must implement: Chapter 3: Module Layer, version 1.8 Chapter 4: Life Cycle Layer, version 1.8 Chapter 5: Service Layer, version 1.8 Chapter 6: Resource API Specification, version 1.0 Chapter 7: Bundle Wiring API Specification, version 1.2 Chapter 8: Framework Namespaces Specification, version 1.1 Chapter 9: Start Level API Specification, version 1.0 Chapter 10: Framework API Specification, which contains the following packages org.osgi.framework version 1.8 org.osgi.framework.launch version 1.2 org.osgi.resource version 1.0 org.osgi.framework.wiring version 1.2 org.osgi.framework.startlevel version 1.0 org.osgi.framework.namespace version 1.1 org.osgi.annotation.versioning version 1.0 Chapter 53: Resolver Hook Service Specification, version 1.0 Chapter 54: Bundle Hook Service Specification, version 1.1 Chapter 55: Service Hook Service Specification, version 1.1 Chapter 56: Weaving Hook Service Specification, version 1.1 Chapter 57: Data Transfer Objects Specification, version 1.0 Implementation Core Framework Release Link Certification Apache Felix 6 http://felix.apache.org Participates Concierge 5 http://projects.eclipse.org/projects/iot.concierge/ Eclipse Equinox 6 http://eclipse.org/equinox Participates JBoss 4.2 http://www.jboss.org/jbossas/osgi Hitachi 4.x
